decision_conditions: The proposed third-floor extension with mansarded front elevation, by reason of its bulk, massing, materials, and position, would constitute an intrusive, incongruous and prominent feature, out of keeping with and detrimental to the character of Ealing Green Conservation Area and the terrace. The development would not comply with the NPPF (2023), Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Ealing Green Conservation Area Character Appraisal (2008), Ealing Green Conservation Area Management Plan (2008) and A Strategic Review of Ealing's Conservation Areas - Generic Management Plan for Conservation Areas (2023).
description: Construction of a third floor to accommodate additional bedroom for existing flat
